source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_00<tab>The look of steely resolve in Bajsaljen's eyes suggests the hour of battle draws nigh.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_00<tab>ヴァルデニス前哨地のバイシャーエンは、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_01<tab>The Resistance stands ready to march against the IVth Legion in the hopes of distracting them long enough for Cid to carry out his plan. If all goes well, the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var> will be disabled, perhaps giving Bajsaljen and his troops the edge needed to rout the imperials once and for all.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_01<tab>バイシャーエンより作戦開始が宣言された。ヴァルデニス前哨地の「リリヤ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_02<tab>Lilja has finished work on the D.A.M., and has even found the ideal location at which to set it. However, a number of final adjustments have to be made on-site, meaning that she must accompany you out onto the battlefield.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_02<tab>リリヤと敵旗艦の近くに誘導装置を設置することになった。ザトゥノル高原の高原北方台地にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB1A301 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_03<tab>While seeking a suitable spot to set the D.A.M., you are assaulted by a small unit of IVth Legion soldiers. They prove no match for your martial prowess, and it is not long before you and Lilja resume preparing the D.A.M.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_03<tab>現れた帝国兵を討伐した。ザトゥノル高原の高原北方台地にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB1DE01 /var>」を再度調べよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_04<tab>With the D.A.M. in place, the Resistance is ready to set their plan in motion. What they were not expecting, however, was for the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var> to roar to life. Undeterred by the not-so-small setback of the imperial warship entering the fray, Cid succeeds in activating the aetherwave amplifier, and the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var> is forced to make an emergency landing. The sight of this emboldens the Resistance, and so they prepare to press forward.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_04<tab>作戦は無事に成功し、急行してきたフランによって、ミコトも救出された。ヴァルデニス前哨地の「バイシャーエン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_05The Dalriada has been rendered inoperable, but it remains to be seen what armaments yet remain within. Even so, there may never come a finer opportunity for the Resistance to strike, and Bajsaljen intends to seize it. He asks that you accompany his troops into the warship, and at last put an end to the IVth Legion's schemes to control Bozja.

※Players may enter the Dalriada via the associated critical engagement.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_05いよいよ旗艦ダル・リアータへと突入することになった。レジスタンスとともに、待ち受けるメネニウスや敵の兵器を撃破しよう。

※「旗艦ダル・リアータ攻略戦」は、ザトゥノル高原で該当の「クリティカルエンゲージメント」に申請することで参加できます。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_06<tab>With Lyon and Menenius defeated, the IVth Legion's plans appear to have fallen to ruin. There is no time to revel in your victory, however, for the Allagan weapon, which lay dormant in the ship, breaks free from its confines. It takes to the sky and begins amassing energy to release in an attack of cataclysmic proportions. Before delivering its fatal blow to the people of Bozja, however, Queen Gunnhildr appears, her holy blade in hand. The two entities clash overhead, the ensuing explosion claiming both the Allagan weapon and the queen.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_06<tab>暴走したディアブロ・アーマメントは、闘神化したミーシィヤによって消滅した。ヴァルデニス前哨地の「マルシャーク」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_07<tab>The threat of the IVth Legion and their Allagan weapon is no more. You thought to speak with Bajsaljen, but Marsak informs you he has already returned to Gangos. After your many travails together, the Resistance leader would no doubt welcome you to reflect on this historic victory.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_07<tab>バイシャーエンたちは、先にガンゴッシュへと戻ったらしい。ザトゥノル高原を離れ、ガンゴッシュへと向かおう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_08<tab>You expect to find Bajsaljen in the midst of merrymaking, but instead he is already hard at work setting the foundation for a new Bozja. The myriad factions that comprised the Resistance originally came together out of necessity, but if all goes to plan, the dream of a united Bozja may very well soon become a reality.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_08<tab>聖剣セイブ・ザ・クイーン、そしてボズヤという国家は、かつてボズヤに暮らしていた者たちが奪還を果たした。ガンゴッシュの「マルシャーク」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_09<tab>The fight for freedom is won, and now work to rebuild may begin in earnest. Only time will tell what manner of nation Bozja will become, but you have every confidence it will prove a beacon of peace and prosperity to which others will aspire.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SEQ_09<tab>マルシャークたちは、新生ボズヤの建国に励んでいくという。彼らと進む道のりはここで一度途絶えるが、また道が交わるそのときまで、どのような国家を彼らが作り出すか、遠方より見守っていこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>A Resistance rank of <var 20 E802 /var> is required to proceed with this quest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_100_000本クエストを進行するためには、
レジスタンスランクが「」以上である必要があります。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_000<tab>Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. We have finished preparations for a full-scale assault. We will keep the imperials occupied, while Cid executes his plan to disable the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_000解放者殿……すべての準備が整いました。
我らは全戦力をもって、第IV軍団に戦いを挑みます。
あとは、計画どおりに事が進むと、そう信じましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_001<tab>Our work on the aetherwave amplifier is complete, and the crystal focus has been mounted on board the <var 1A 02 /var>Ia'sar<var 1A 01 /var>. That said, it's hard to gauge the range of the pulse it will generate. In the event things don't go to plan, have your men ready to disperse.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_001「対青燐機関波動兵器」に覗覚石を積んで調整を施した。
検証もできてるが、どの程度の範囲に影響を与えるかは未知数だ。
一か八かの賭けになるが、万が一の場合は速やかに撤収してくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_002<tab>You have nothing to worry about, Cid. The amplifier will work. I have seen it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_002大丈夫ですよ、シドさん。
この試みは必ず成功します。
私の「未来視」がそれを保証しますよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RINOK_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it's been far too long. A pity our meeting is under such dire circumstances. But never fear, Cid and Mikoto'll be in good hands aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Ia'sar<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RINOK_000_003久しぶりダ……アンタとこうやって共闘できるなんテネ。
飛空艇の操縦はアタイに任せトキナ！
無事に目標地点まで装置を運ぶからネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BWAGI_000_004<tab>The amplifier has been loaded onto the ship, and the engine has been insulated against the blast.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BWAGI_000_004「対青燐機関波動兵器」ならすでにイウサールに積んであるゼ。
爆破時のエーテル波によって飛空艇のエンジンが壊れないヨウ、
防御シールドも設置済みダ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_005<tab>That's not all. The Mark IV D.A.M. is ready to go, and I've found just the place to put it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_005上空のイウサール号へ向けて放射できるよう改良を施した、
「メチャユードースルゾークン改」の準備もバッチリッス！
手頃な地脈も割り出したので、あとはそこに設置するだけッス！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_006<tab>Our plan for the upcoming battle is twofold. First and foremost, we must draw the enemy's attention on the ground, affording the crew of the <var 1A 02 /var>Ia'sar<var 1A 01 /var> the opportunity to disable the warship.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_006今回の作戦は二段構えとなります……
地上で敵の注意を惹きつけるための陽動作戦を展開しつつ、
「対青燐機関波動兵器」で敵旗艦を飛行不能に……これが前段階。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_007<tab>This will throw their forces into disarray, granting us the opportunity to press forward and, gods willing, remove the head of their detachment here in Bozja.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_007敵旗艦ダル・リアータの機能が停止したら、
そのまま一気に白兵戦を仕掛け、
ボズヤ分遣隊の指揮系統を奪います。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_008<tab>We speak, of course, of their commander Menenius sas Lanatus. It will be no easy endeavor, however, for we must also contend with the likes of Lyon rem Helsos and his entourage of beasts. Nevertheless, we mustn't lose heart. Remain vigilant, remember your training, and I have faith the day will be ours.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_008狙うは指揮官メネニウスの首！
ですが、敵には未だ獣王ライアンをはじめとする手練れが大勢……
獲物を追い詰める獅子の如く、常に用心を怠らず進軍しましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_009<tab>For Bozja!!!
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_009では、今より作戦を開始しますッ！！
進めッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_030<tab>Well, I guess we'd better get to work too, eh? First things first: setting up the D.A.M.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_030では、自分たちも行動開始するッス！
幸い、敵旗艦の近くに地脈があったので、
そこに「メチャユードースルゾークン改」を設置するッス！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_031<tab>The location is right there, on your map. Trouble is, there are a few final adjustments that have to be made on-site, meaning I'll have to come along. You can handle any imperials that show up...right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_031地図に印を付けておくッス！　そこが目標地点ッス！
最終調整はその場でしかできないので、自分も同行するッス！
……敵は、英雄さんにお任せするのでよろしくッス！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_050<tab>Everything's set, Chief. Sending the coordinates now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_050ボス……こちらは準備完了ッス。
座標を送るので、その真上が目標地点ッス。

source:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_051(-Cid-)We'll be there as soon as we can.
Rinok, Mikoto, it's time to head out.
Did you get all that, Bajsaljen?
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_051(-シドの声-)わかった……リノ、ミコト、発進だ！
……バイシャーエン、聞こえるか？
もう一息だ……しのいでくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_052<tab>(-Bajsaljen-)We will hold their attention for as long as we can. Godsspeed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_052(-バイシャーエンの声-)シド殿……我らのことは気になさいますな。
ご武運を…………！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_053<tab><gasp> Oh, no! The warship...!
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_053あッ！！　見てくださいッ！！
旗艦ダル・リアータが……動き出しますッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_300<tab>Damn it! Are we too late?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_300<tab>く……遂に動き出しましたか……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_301<tab>Sir, look!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_301<tab>バイシャーエン様……あれを！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_302<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Ia'sar<var 1A 01 /var>... Gods, please let his plan work.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_302来ましたか、飛空艇イウサール……
あとは、頼みましたよ……シド殿……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_303<tab>Ahhh!!!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_303<tab>きゃああぁぁあッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_304<tab>What in the seven hells was that!?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_304<tab>今のは何なんだッ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_305<tab>Could it be the Allagan weapon is operational?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_305<tab>あれが古代アラグ帝国の遺物の……力……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_IMPERIALSOLDIERA04088_000_306<tab>Sir, the target is too small to score a direct hit!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_IMPERIALSOLDIERA04088_000_306<tab>駄目です！　目標が小さすぎます！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_307<tab>They won't be so lucky a second time. Fire again!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_307<tab>第二弾を装填せよ！　急げ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_IMPERIALSOLDIERB04088_000_308<tab>Y-Yes, sir! Energy levels at 45%...
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_IMPERIALSOLDIERB04088_000_308<tab>第二弾、エネルギーを装填中！　45％！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_309<tab>Bad news, I'm afraid. The amplifier has been damaged and we've lost the coordinates of the D.A.M!
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_309目標座標を失いました！
今の衝撃で、回路が損傷したようです！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_310<tab>Of all the rotten luck!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_310<tab>クソッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_311<tab>(-Cid-)Did you catch that, Lilja? We've lost the coordinates!
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_311(-シドの声-)目標座標をロストした！
回路が破損したようだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_312<tab>(-Cid-)Quickly, send up a flare!
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_312(-シドの声-)リリヤ、時間がない！
目視のために閃光弾を打ち上げてくれッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_313<tab>Understood, Chief!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_313<tab>イエッサー！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_314<tab>There!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_314<tab>そこだッ！！　急げッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_315<tab>(-Mikoto-)Now! Activate the D.A.M!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_315<tab>(-ミコトの声-)今です！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_316<tab>Come on, don't fail me now!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_316<tab>よしッ！！　いけぇッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_IMPERIALSOLDIERA04088_000_317<tab>The engines─they've shut down! Preparing for emergency landing!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_IMPERIALSOLDIERA04088_000_317<tab>青燐機関が停止！！　緊急着陸しますッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_318<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_318<tab>なんだとッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_319<tab>Mikoto, nooo!!!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_319<tab>ミコトーーーッッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_320<tab>Take us down. Now!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_320<tab>早く下へ！！　ミコトが！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RINOK_000_321<tab>Right!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RINOK_000_321<tab>わかっテル！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_322<tab>(-???-)Your Sharlayan companion is safe, though I cannot say the same for you at present. It would behoove you to retreat.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_322(-女性の声-)……シャーレアンの賢人殿なら無事に救出した。
前哨地へ帰還されるがよい。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_323<tab>What? Who is this?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_323<tab>本当か！？　……誰だ、あんた？？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_324<tab>Fran. General of the Dalmascan resistance. We may save the pleasantries for when you are returned to Camp Vrdelnis.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_324ダルマスカ・レジスタンスを指揮するフランと申す者……
ゆっくりと挨拶したいところだが、今はその時間も惜しい。
とにかく、一旦、ヴァルデニス前哨地へ退くとしよう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_325(-Cid-)Fran...? Right, Jenomis has told me about you.
All right, heading back now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_325(-シドの声-)あんたの噂ならジェノミスから聞いている……
わかった……前哨地で会おう！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_330<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Bwagi said I would find you here. From what I gather, you are no stranger to conflict with the imperials.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_330聖天使アルテマを退けし者よ……ここでお目にかかろうとはな。
貴公の活躍……ブワジから報告を受けているぞ。
さすがはドマ・アラミゴの解放者殿であるな。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_331<tab>Should they be defeated here, it will deal a heavy blow to the IVth Legion, who yet occupy my homeland of Dalmasca. One by one, we will reclaim those lands that were stolen from us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_331ボズヤに駐留する第IV軍団の企てを阻止することが、
我が祖国ダルマスカ解放のために必要なのは間違いないが、
私は帝国に虐げられた者すべての解放のため、ここにいる……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_332<tab>And be it the Empire or any other would-be tyrant, we will never surrender to those who would deny us our freedom.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_332いや、帝国かどうかは関係ない……
人を束縛し自由を奪う、そうした者たちに私は反逆する！
人は常に自由でなければならないのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_333<tab>I suspect we are of a similar mind on such matters, and I am honored to have the opportunity to fight at your side.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_333貴公とこうして肩を並べて戦えること、私は誇りに思うぞ。
すべての者たちを束縛する鉄鎖を打ち砕き、
真の自由を取り戻すこと、それを共に目指そう！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_ROSTIK_000_335<tab>Soon it will all be over. Oh Father... Would that you could have lived to see this day.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_ROSTIK_000_335いよいよ最後の仕上げだな……
私が今日まで生き存えた理由がここにある……
父の仇……同胞の無念を今こそ晴らしてやろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_350<tab>Our plan worked, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! The <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var> was forced to make an abrupt landing after the amplifier released its pulse, just as Cid predicted.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_350お帰りなさいませ、解放者殿……。
シド殿の「対青燐機関波動兵器」はうまくいきました。
こちらの思惑どおり敵機動飛空戦艦は行動不能に陥ったようです。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_351<tab>We did not all emerge from the encounter unscathed, however. Lilja was badly wounded. We have done what we can for her, but she needs proper medical attention.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_351残念ながら、リリヤ殿の怪我は思った以上に酷く、
我が手でとりあえずの手当を施しましたが、
きちんとした医療機関での対処が必要です……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_352<tab>I've already spoken with Lord Hien, and his chirurgeons are ready and awaiting her arrival in Doma.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_352リリヤの治療の件なら大丈夫だ。
ドマのヒエンが受け入れ体制を整えてくれている。
これからドマへリリヤを移送するよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_353<tab>Could I trouble you for use of the <var 1A 02 /var>Ia'sar<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_353<tab>悪いが、イウサール号とリノを借りるぜ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BWAGI_000_354<tab>Yes, we'd be glad to help.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BWAGI_000_354モチロン、構わンサ……
お嬢ちゃんを助けてやってクレ、頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_355<tab>I would accompany her to Doma as well, if that's all right.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_355<tab>私もリリヤさんに付き添ってドマへ向かいます。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_100_355<tab>This wouldn't have happened if not for me...
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_100_355<tab>……私のせいで……こんなことに。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_356<tab>You may have glimpsed the future, but you didn't see everything. There was no way of knowing for certain what would happen to any of us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_356君のせいじゃない。
「未来視」でもリリヤの負傷を見てないんだ。
それに、その能力を過信しちゃいけない。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_357<tab>Using the amplifier was my plan, but we all knew the risks involved, including Lilja. This is a war we're fighting, after all.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_357閃光弾を撃たせたのはオレだからな。
責があるのはオレだよ。
だが、リリヤも覚悟はしていたはずだ……ここは戦場だからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_358<tab>But this is hardly the time to discuss such matters. We have a long journey ahead of us, and I daresay your healing magicks will be of great comfort to her until we reach Doma.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_358とにかくドマへ向かおう。
君の治癒師としての力を借りたいしな。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_359<tab>While they tend to our wounded comrade, let us deliver the final blow to the enemy. With the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var> disabled, and reinforcements newly arrived from Dalmasca, we may never have a finer opportunity to strike.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_359それでは、我らは最後の決戦に挑むことにします。
敵機動飛空戦艦が行動不能である内に白兵戦を仕掛けましょう。
幸い、ダルマスカのフラン殿も駆けつけてくれました。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_360<tab>We will offer whatever assistance we can if it means defeating the IVth Imperial Legion.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_360ダルマスカ・レジスタンスのフランだ。
我らに仇なす第IV軍団に抗う者として、
微力ながらお手伝いしたいと考え、馳せ参じたもの……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_361<tab>Though we can offer little in the way of materiel, I have brought several vehicles which I believe will prove helpful in this final endeavor.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_361わずかではあるがエアバイクを数台、輸送した。
今回の作戦に役立てていただけると幸いである。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_362<tab>General Fran, you have our gratitude. I will see they are put to good use.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_362<tab>フラン殿、ご厚意に深く感謝致します。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_363<tab>It is time we make ready. The coming battle will decide the fate of Bozja.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_363それでは、皆さん、今より白兵戦を仕掛けます。
これが最後の戦いになるはずです……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_364<tab>But as we have seen, our enemy is willing to employ any means at their disposal, no matter how reckless or deplorable. We have reason to believe they have obtained a deadly new weapon, and we must be prepared to adapt our strategy as the situation warrants.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_364ですが、先ほどの攻撃にもあるように、
奴らの手には我らの知らぬ兵器があるやもしれません。
十分に用心して仕掛けるようにしましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_365<tab>Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. May we count on your assistance one last time?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_365<tab>この白兵戦、解放者殿も参加されますよな……？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_Q2_000_200<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_Q2_000_200<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A1_000_200<tab>We <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> free Bozja. Together!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A1_000_200<tab>ボズヤ解放をこの手に！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A2_000_200<tab>One way or another, we're putting an end to this.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A2_000_200<tab>これ以上の死者を出さぬためにも戦乱を終結させよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_366<tab>And there you have it! Time and again <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has fought at our side, and we have overcome many a foe. Now, we stride into battle once more, and by the grace of the gods, victory will be ours!
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_366解放者殿こそ、我ら帝国に虐げられた者を導く正しき予言者！
このお方さえいれば、我らの勝利は約束されたも同然ッ！！
一同の奮闘を望みます…………以上、解散ッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_367<tab>'Tis true the imperials' presence in the sky is greatly diminished, but Menenius has yet to reveal this Allagan weapon of his. And that is to say nothing of Lyon and his beasts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_367……いよいよメネニウスとの決戦となりますが、
奴らが発掘したという「アラグの悪魔」も気になるところ。
獣王ライアンも未だ健在ですので一筋縄ではいかぬでしょうな。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_368<tab>Our victory will not be easily won, but I have faith that, together, we will prevail in the end.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_368<tab>どうぞ、今一度、解放者殿のお力を我らのために……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_500<tab>For godssake, boy. What did I tell you about bowing out with a bit of grace? It's over, Menenius. We've lost.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_500いい加減にしろ、小僧ッ！
もうこうなっちまったらオレたちの負けだ！
引き際が肝心だって、ガキの頃から教えただろうよッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_501<tab>Even so, the relic cannot...<var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> not fall into the hands of the Bozjans. I will have it jettisoned from the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var> into the ruins whence it came. Once our troops have been evacuated, I will engage the ship's self-destruct sequence and seal the entrance, keeping the relic beyond the reach of those savages.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_501アレを……あの悪魔をボズヤの愚民どもに渡すわけにはいかん。
艦より切り離し再び奈落へと沈めた後、艦を爆破し蓋としようぞ。
さすれば、幾許かの時間を稼げるというもの。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_502<tab>Meanwhile, you are to take the rest of our detachment back to Dalmasca and crush the resistance. Then─and only then─are you to return here and reclaim Gabranth's weapon. Am I understood?
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_502貴公は残った兵をまとめ、ダルマスカへ帰還するのだ。
そして、ダルマスカ・レジスタンスを討ち破った後、
再びこの地へ戻り、悪魔を閣下の手に……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_503<tab>So it's the coward's way out, is it? Not man enough to face him after your resounding failure?
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_503バカ言うンじゃねぇッ！
オレに生き恥を晒せっていうのか！！
ボズヤの失敗の責任を取るのはオメェだろーよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_504<tab>It was I Gabranth entrusted with the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>, his final hope of claiming these lands as his own. If that hope is to die here, then I would perish with it. I have naught but my life to offer to make amends for all we have lost.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_504我は……閣下より預かりしこのダル・リアータと運命を共にせん。
死して、命を散らした者たちにあの世で詫びよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_505<tab>Look, Menenius, everyone's bound to have a spot of bad luck eventually, even you. Now isn't the time for drastic measures.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_505古来より戦いの結果はその時の運次第ってな。
今回は運が悪かった……ただ、それだけだ。
まぁ、いいじゃねぇか、気にすンな……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_506<tab>As much as I'd enjoy seeing an arrogant, forked-tongued prig such as yourself go down in a fiery ball of ruin, I know Gabranth still has a part for you to play.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_506オメェは、性格も悪いし口も悪い。
だが、それでもオッ死んじゃいけネェな……。
責任を取るべき「時」はいずれまた来るンだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_507<tab>If you want to bury the relic, fine─I'll even help you. But when we're done, we go and speak with him <var 1A 02 /var>together<var 1A 01 /var> and explain what happened. All right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_507悪魔をゴミ箱に棄てるだけならふたりでやろうや。
で、ふたりで雁首揃えてノア坊に謝ろうぜ。
それでいいじゃねぇか……なぁ？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_508<tab>Your stubbornness never ceases to confound me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_508貴公は上官からの命令を何度無視する気なのだ……
呆れて物が言えんよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_509<tab>Good. If that's what it takes to get through to you, I'll be as stubborn as I like.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_509ふんっ、クソな命令なんざクソでしかねぇからな。
破られるようなクソ命令が悪いンだ。
あと、そんなクソをひねりだすクソヤローが悪い！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_510<tab>Hmph. And you would call me the arrogant one.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MENENIUS_000_510我は性格は悪いかも知れぬが、
口は貴公ほど悪くはないぞ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_511<tab>You may now access the critical engagement “the Dalriada.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_511新たなクリティカルエンゲージメント、
「旗艦ダル・リアータ攻略戦」が開放されました！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_512<tab>This critical engagement will be initiated when a sufficient number of players with access to the Dalriada are present in Zadnor.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_512「旗艦ダル・リアータ攻略戦」を開放したプレイヤーが、
一定数いる状態で、一定時間が経過すると、
該当のクリティカルエンゲージメントが発生します。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_513<tab>Furthermore, by completing other skirmishes and critical engagements, the time required before the Dalriada can be initiated again will be reduced.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_513なお、「旗艦ダル・リアータ攻略戦」は、
スカーミッシュやクリティカルエンゲージメントの攻略によって、
発生までの時間が短縮されます。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_514<tab>Be sure to prepare lost actions from the lost finds cache, as they may prove key to turning the tide of battle.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_514しっかりと「ロストアクション」を準備して、
「旗艦ダル・リアータ攻略戦」に挑戦しましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_520<tab>I know not what Menenius has unearthed in the ruins, but I would rather not afford him time to employ it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_520……いよいよメネニウスとの決戦となりますが、
奴らが発掘したという「アラグの悪魔」も気になるところ。
獣王ライアンも未だ健在ですので一筋縄ではいかぬでしょうな。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_521<tab>Let us be swift, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, and put an end to him and the IVth Legion.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_521<tab>どうぞ、今一度、解放者殿のお力を我らのために……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_TODO_000_100<tab>Speak with Bajsaljen.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_TODO_000_100<tab>ヴァルデニス前哨地のバイシャーエンと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_600<tab>Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! Thank goodness you are unharmed.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_600<tab>解放者殿！　よくぞご無事で！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_601<tab>What is this place...?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_601<tab>これは……いったい……？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_602<tab>Lyon!? Menenius!?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_602<tab>き、貴様達は……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_603<tab>Everyone! Fall back, now!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_603<tab>全員、退避ッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_604<tab>Menenius, you fool! ...It's not supposed to end like this!
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_604おおい！　冗談だろッ！！
なんだよ、それッ！？
なんでオメェが先に逝くンだよッッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_605<tab><var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the Allagan relic!?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_605<tab>あれが……アラグの悪魔………！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_606<tab>By the gods... It will destroy us all!
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_606<tab>すべてを破壊するつもりかッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_607<tab>In the name of Queen Gunnhildr, I will not allow you to harm these children of Bozja.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_607民を護るのが 我が務め……
それが 女王グンヒルドに課せられた使命……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_608<tab>Queen Gunnhildr, she...she saved us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_608女王……グンヒルドが……
闘神セイブ・ザ・クイーンが……我らを護ったというのか……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_609<tab>Oh Misija...
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_609<tab>ミーシィヤ……きみは……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_620<tab>No... Leave me be...
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_620<tab>…………もう……いい…………

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_621<tab>Please, Misija, you must hold on. I promised you we will rebuild Bozja, and I want you to see it for yourself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_621諦めてはなりませんよ、ミーシィヤさん……
貴女は私たちが作る新生ボズヤを見届けなければなりません。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_622<tab>For...what purpose...? Remorse? Repentance?
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_622……それを見て……後悔しろと…………？
…………罪を悔い改めろ………と…………？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_623<tab>Do not...misunderstand, Bajsaljen...
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_623……勘違い……するな…………バイシャーエン…………
ボズヤの民を……護ること……こそが……務め…………
女王の……責務を全う……したに……すぎぬ…………

source:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_624I...care not...for forgiveness.
Today...I fulfilled my duty...to the queen... Nothing more.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_624……許しを請うつもりなど……ない…………
私は……あくまでも……属州ボズヤ人…………
……第IV軍団の兵士……だから……な…………

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_625<tab>I am a Bozjan, yes. But also an imperial... A traitor...
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_625……民を護ったのは……女王グンヒルドだが…………
私は……貴様たちにとっては……ただの……裏切り者……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_626<tab>Justice...must be served. The people...demand it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_626私はただの裏切り者として……処罰されねばならん……
でなければ……民は納得せん……
……人心を勝ち取る……ために……成すべきことを……のだ……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_627<tab>Fulfill your duty... As I have mine... Please...
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_627……やはり……その役目は……貴様だ……
蛮神殺し……の……英雄よ……
闘神……である……私に……とどめを……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_Q3_000_300<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_Q3_000_300<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A1_000_300<tab>Grant her request.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A1_000_300<tab>（ミーシィヤの願いどおりにする）

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A2_000_300<tab>Leave her be.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A2_000_300<tab>（自分にはできないと首を横に振る）

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_Q4_000_400<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_Q4_000_400<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A3_000_400<tab>Grant her request.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A3_000_400<tab>（ミーシィヤの願いどおりにする）

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A4_000_400<tab>Leave her be.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A4_000_400<tab>（自分にはできないと首を横に振る）

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_628<tab>Thank you...
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MEESIYA_000_628<tab>……それで……よい…………

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_629<tab>No, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. She is gone.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_629<tab>もう……逝きました…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_630<tab>If it must be done, I will do it.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_630<tab>それは……私の役目でしょう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_100_630<tab>Farewell, Misija. Until we meet again...
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_100_630<tab>母なるエーテル界で……また相まみえましょう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_631<tab>No, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. This is not your burden to bear.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_631<tab>そこまで解放者殿が背負う必要はございません……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_100_631<tab>Your sacrifice will not be forgotten, Misija. And I pray it need never again be repeated.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_100_631<tab>二度と貴女のような咎人を作らぬことを……誓いましょう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_632<tab>Please, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Let me grant her this final mercy.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_632<tab>貴女の罪を……私も背負いましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_100_632<tab>Good-bye, Misija. May the queen bless you and keep you...
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_100_632<tab>楽にしてあげますよ……ミーシィヤさん……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_650<tab>At long last, victory is ours. There are still remnants of the IVth Legion to contend with, but I believe it is safe to say the war for Bozja is over.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_650解放者殿、お疲れ様でした……我々の勝利です！
敗残兵らの処理に今しばらく時間はかかるでしょうが、
宿願であったボズヤ解放が完遂したといっても過言ではないはず。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_651<tab>Many of our brothers and sisters were lost on our path to freedom, but I take heart in knowing that their sacrifices were not in vain. That our dream of a new Bozja will finally come true.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_651この勝利のために同胞にも多くの死傷者が出ました……。
もう声を上げることのできぬ者たちの願い……無碍にはしません！
その想いに応えるため我々は新たなボズヤを築かねば……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_652<tab>Bajsaljen has returned to Gangos, and I have no doubt he would be glad for your company.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_652バイシャーエン様らは一足先にガンゴッシュへ戻られました。
解放者殿も共にガンゴッシュへ参りましょう。
そして、勝利を共に分かち合おうではありませんか。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_653<tab>...Misija? We thought it best if her remains were not returned to Gangos. To some, she was naught more than a hated enemy, and even in death, she would be an object of their scorn. But rest assured, I will see to it personally that she is given a proper burial.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_653……ミーシィヤですか？　いえ、ガンゴッシュへは移送しません。
憎しみの対象として……晒そうと言い出す輩もいるでしょうから。
彼女の遺体は、私が……私が責任をもって埋葬致します……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_700<tab>Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Words can scarcely convey my gratitude for all you have done for the people of Bozja.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_700解放者殿、ありがとうございました。
のおかげでボズヤを我らの手に取り戻すことができました。
深く感謝すると共にあらためてお礼を申し上げます。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_701<tab>Though the fight for Bozja is over, our work is far from done. When faced with the IVth Legion, the Bozjan Resistance stood as a united, cohesive unit. But I now foresee disputes between its various factions as they seek to pursue their individual aims.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_701ああ……戦いは終わりましたが、これからが正念場。
第IV軍団という共通の敵がいる限り、我らも一枚岩でしたが、
これからは個々の利益のために内輪で争いが始まる可能性も。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_702<tab>For that reason, I wish to first create a council of leaders, that we might discuss and establish laws to govern our people.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_702そうならぬよう、まずは国家の基盤ができるまでは、
各組織の代表を指導者グループと位置づけ、
暫定政権として国家を回したいと考えております。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_703<tab>I have already begun drafting documents that may one day serve as our constitution, though it remains to be seen if they will meet with the others' approval.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_703まずは、新たな法の草案作りから、
各行政府や警察機構などの人事を……と、
その準備を始めていたところでした。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_704<tab>You see, I have chosen to base a number of my writings on the principles of the IVth Legion.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_704……私は新憲法の草案作りに第IV軍団が定めた法を、
参考にしようと考えております。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_705<tab>With all due respect, sir, I do not think it wise to openly admit to borrowing from the <var 1A 02 /var>imperial doctrine<var 1A 01 /var> of all things. The people would be up in arms!
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_705バイシャーエン様、そのような事を口に出してはなりませぬ……
皆が動揺致します……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_706<tab>They deserve to know the truth, Marsak, and I have my reasons for choosing such an approach.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_706よいのです……
我らは、旧き良きボズヤを取り戻すために戦いましたが、
悪しき習慣は完全に捨て去らねばなりません。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_707<tab>While many of us dedicated ourselves to the Resistance, there are those who would rather live in peace, even if that means submitting to imperial rule. Some, like Misija, saw the Empire's ways as preferable to our own.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_707レジスタンスとして命を捧げた者もいますが、
戦争を厭い、属州民として暮らす者も多い……
中にはミーシィヤのように第IV軍団の統治を望む者もいるはず。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_708<tab>To discard everything that came as a result of the occupation would cause more harm than good. There are many things introduced by the imperials from which we stand to benefit, and it would be foolish to dismiss them simply because they came from the enemy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_708敵であったとしてもそれが「優れた法」ならば、
我らはそれに学び、吸収せねばならないのです。
そのことをボズヤの民は皆、心して欲しい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_709<tab>Make no mistake─the Bozja I intend to build will be free of discrimination and poverty. A nation of the people, by the people, and for the people. As such, it will require the understanding and cooperation of all.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_709我らが築く新たなボズヤ……新生ボズヤは、
皆が平等に権利を持ち、差別や貧困のない社会を目指します。
そして、それが維持できるよう皆で努力しなければなりません。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_710<tab>A great deal of blood has been shed that we might come this far, and I pray we never forget, that we may never again have to endure such tragedy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_710この新生ボズヤのために多くの血が流されたこと、
それを我らは忘れてはならないのです。
二度とこのような惨劇を繰り返さぬためにも……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_711<tab>(-Familiar Voice-)Well, I for one have every confidence that you will lead Bozja to a bright and prosperous future. If Ala Mhigo and Doma are able to thrive, I see no reason why Bozja can't do the same.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_711(-聞き覚えのある声-)あんたなら大丈夫さ、バイシャーエン。
アラミゴやドマのような良い国をあんたなら実現できる。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_712<tab>Cid. Mikoto. Welcome back.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_712これはシド殿……シャーレアンの賢人殿……
おかえりなさいませ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_713<tab>And here I thought you might actually take a moment to enjoy your hard-earned victory. Such steadfast dedication to rebuilding Bozja is proof enough the people are in good hands.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_713祝いの酒でも飲んでるのかと思いきや、
もう次のステップへ進もうとしている……
あんたは本当に真摯な男だ、だが、それがいい。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_714<tab>Did Lilja not return with you? Has she yet to recover?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_714<tab>……リリヤ殿の容体はいかがです？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_715<tab>It was touch and go at first, extracting the shrapnel from her stomach, but she's doing much better now. You should have seen her protesting when we insisted she stay behind to rest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_715腹部に食い込んだ金属片を取り出すのに手間はかかったが、
ドマの治癒師たちのおかげでもう大丈夫だ。
ガンゴッシュへ戻りたいって騒いでいたぐらいさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_716<tab>(-Lilja-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I was worried sick about you. Right when you needed me most, I let my guard down... Sorry I couldn't be there with you to the end.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_716(-リリヤの声-)英雄さん……ご心配をおかけしたッス……
でも、もう自分は大丈夫ッス……
……最後の最後でこんなヘマしちゃってごめんなさいッス。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_Q1_000_100<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_Q1_000_100<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A1_000_100<tab>You did your best, and that's all I could ask for.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A1_000_100<tab>ヘマなんてとんでもない、よく頑張った！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A2_000_100<tab>Never mind that. How are your wounds?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_A2_000_100<tab>傷は大丈夫なのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_720<tab>(-Lilja-)That... That means a lot coming from you. <sniffle> More than you know...
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_720(-リリヤの声-)……ほ、本当ッスか。
自分を褒めてくれるんスか！？
……嬉しいッス……もう泣きそうッス……ふえぇぇぇぇ……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_725<tab>(-Lilja-)I've never felt better! As a matter of fact, I was about to gather my things and head back to─gah! My stomach!
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_725(-リリヤの声-)こんな傷、全然たいしたことないッス！
もう動けるッスよ！　すぐにガンゴッシュへ戻りたいぐらいッス！
いや、やっぱりすぐに、そっちへ向かうッス……イテテテテ……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_730<tab>Sounds like the chirurgeons are taking good care of you, Lilja, and I trust you won't be giving them any trouble. It'd be a shame if I had to send Jessie to keep an eye on you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_CID_000_730おい、リリヤ！　おまえはウチの大事な戦力なんだ。
傷を治すのも仕事だって言っただろ。
いいから、大人しく寝てろ、さもなくば看病にジェシーを……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_731<tab>(-Lilja-)Jessie!? ...I think I'd prefer the shrapnel.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_LILJA_000_731<tab>(-リリヤの声-)そ、それだけは勘弁ッス！！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GEROLT_000_732<tab>What in the─ <hic> Why're ye all standin' about like a bunch o' prissy─ <hic> prissy ol' maids? Ye <var 1A 02 /var>won<var 1A 01 /var>, didn't ye? Relax! Come an' have a pint or two! Or three! <hic>
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GEROLT_000_732おいおい、いつまでくっちゃべってンだよ～！
祝いの席なんだ、主役たちが離席のままじゃ、皆酔えないだろ？
ほぅら、さっさと来いよ～！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_733<tab>Wheresoever your path may lead, it seems fortune sees fit to smile upon you. Not only have you led the Resistance to rout the IVth Legion, by some miracle the weapon they unearthed from these lands was also vanquished. On behalf of the people of Dalmasca, you have my sincerest thanks.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_733第IV軍団の戦力を大幅に削ることができたばかりか、
アラグの遺物を利用しようとする野望を食い止めることができた。
貴公には世話になった……ダルマスカを代表して礼を述べよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_734<tab>Of course, the war is not truly over until we have dealt with Gabranth. He is no doubt planning his next move, and I intend to be prepared for our next encounter with the imperials. When that time comes, I daresay we would benefit from your assistance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_000_734……とはいえ、第IV軍団の本隊は……ガブラスは未だ、
己が「王国楽土」の実現に向けて戦いを仕掛けてこよう。
我々は急ぎダルマスカへ戻り、情報を集めたいと思う。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_100_734<tab>Until the next time. Perhaps in Dalmasca.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_FRAN_100_734<tab>次はダルマスカで会おう。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_735<tab>Another nation freed, following in the footsteps of Doma and Ala Mhigo. A dream realized thanks in part to one troubled soul whom I shall never forget for all my days.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_735この勝利は ドマ・アラミゴの解放者の他にもうひとり
我らのために 命を散らした者がいたことを 私は忘れないだろう

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_736<tab>In the eyes of the people she will forever remain a criminal. A traitor. Yet it was she who delivered us from certain destruction.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_736彼女は 民からは「咎人」として記憶され 忌み嫌われるはずだ
だが その最期に 女王としての責務を 果たしたのだ

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_100_736<tab>Her crimes were said to be unforgivable, but what of ours? Was it not our callousness, our animus, that fueled her hatred?
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_100_736彼女は許されざる罪を犯したが そうさせたのも我らである
我らの中の わずかな歪みが 彼女を「咎人」にしてしまったのだ

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_101_736<tab>I squandered every opportunity to guide her, ignored every unspoken plea for help. Her loss is a scar on my heart that will never heal. A ceaseless reminder of my inadequacy and shame.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_101_736救える余地はあったはずだ だが そうはならなかった
私はそれを恥じる 一生後悔するだろう

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_737<tab>Can you sense anything?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_737<tab>……何かを感じますか？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_738<tab>Then it is as I thought. The last of the blade's residual aether is spent. The queen is no more...
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MIKOTO_000_738秘められていたエーテルを感じなくなりました。
もう、最後の女王の魂は存在しない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_739<tab>Who could have foreseen that Misija would carry on Queen Gunnhildr's duty? Protecting her people to the very last.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_739この世界に生きる者たちすべてに変革を求めることはできません。
一度根付いてしまった価値観やその思想を変える……
それは実に難しいのです……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_740<tab>Did she believe her final act could effect change in the world? Or, perhaps, did she at last find the means to do so within herself? An arduous task in either case. <sigh> A pity we will never know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_740だが、変革の努力をやめてはなりません。
見て見ぬ振りをし、黙して語らず……これもまた罪。
自らの行いを正し、変革を求め続けなければならないのです。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_741<tab>The lady of blades, Save the Queen, was returned to us. Devoid of the queen's grace, perhaps, but not of her hopes for a brighter tomorrow, nor Misija's for a better Bozja.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_741再び 聖剣が ボズヤの民のもとへ戻った……
そこには ボズヤを救った ふたりの女王の願いが 宿っている

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_742<tab>Indeed, their hopes shall live on. In me, in Marsak, in all of our people. The lives lost for our freedom will not have done so in vain, this I swear. Bozja <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> rise again. A land of peace and prosperity they would be proud to call home.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_742女王と共に この戦いで 命を散らした者たちのために
その崇高なる犠牲に恥じぬよう 新たな国家を築くのだ

source:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_743From the Chronicles of the Bozjan Revolution
Bajsaljen Ulgasch
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_BAISHAEN_000_743「ボズヤ解放戦争・回顧録」より抜粋
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　バイシャーエン・ウルガッシュ著

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_750<tab>If you are looking for Mikoto and the others, they have all returned to their homes. I expect you, too, will be leaving us before long. Though if I may be frank, I believe I speak for many when I say we are reluctant to see you go.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_750……ミコトさんやシドさんら、皆さん、帰路につかれました。
解放者殿もガンゴッシュを去るおつもりでしょうが、
本音を申せば、実に名残惜しい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_751<tab>Were it possible, I would ask you to stay and help us in the rebuilding of Bozja, but I understand there are other worldly matters that require your attention.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_751このまま新生ボズヤの建国をお手伝いいただけませんか？
……いや、ただの戯れ言です、お忘れくださいませ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_752<tab>We shall forever be in your debt, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Wherever duty demands you go, know that you always have allies here in Bozja. Farewell.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_MARSHAK_000_752解放者殿には感謝しても足りないほどの恩を受けました。
我々ボズヤの民は皆、それをけっして忘れたりしないでしょう。
何かお困りの時は声をおかけください、次は我々が……！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_800<tab>Meanwhile, at Valnain in Dalmasca...
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_800<tab>一方  ダルマスカ管区バルナイン――

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_000_801<tab>...Thank you, Lyon. You are dismissed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_000_801ご苦労だったな……ライアン。
下がってよいぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_802<tab>That's all? Menenius is dead and that's all you have to say?
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_802……それだけか？
メネニウスが逝ったっていうのに、それだけなのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_000_803<tab>What would you have me say, then?
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_000_803<tab>何を言って欲しいというのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_804<tab>You could at least acknowledge one of your most loyal followers gave his life for the sake of your ambitions.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_804忠義の士をあんな風に無駄死にさせて、
それでいいのかって訊いてるンだよッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_000_805<tab>Menenius understood such sacrifice was inevitable, and by all accounts he did not waver when faced with his demise. Such strength is needed if we are to succeed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_000_805あやつはわかっていた……そうなることを。
あれでよいのだ……我々は「強者」でなければならぬ。
「王国楽土」のため、我々は「悪」でよいのだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_100_805<tab>Time is short, Lyon... <var 1A 02 /var>My<var 1A 01 /var> time is short...
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_100_805それに……時間がない……。
もう時間が残されておらぬのだ……我には……。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_806<tab>So...it finally caught up with you. A damned shame.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_806そうか……もう時間がネェのか……。
残念……だな…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_000_807<tab>Lest the soldiers begin to believe failure may go without consequence, I would have you sent to the gaols in Menenius's stead. I trust this will not pose a problem for you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_GABRANTH_000_807悪いが、しばらく獄にいてもらうぞ……
敗戦の責はメネニウスにあるが、
貴様にもそのくらいしてもらわねば示しがつかんのでな。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_808<tab>...Fine.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_RIAN_000_808わかったよ、好きにしな。
……そういうことにしておいてやるさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SICINIUS_000_809<tab>(-Sicinius mal Vellutus-)Legatus Gabranth, sir.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SICINIUS_000_809<tab>(-シシニアス・マル・ヴェリュータス-)閣下、お持ち致しました……

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SICINIUS_000_810<tab>(-Sicinius mal Vellutus-)We have recovered the relics Menenius unearthed in the Bozjan ruins.
target: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SICINIUS_000_810<tab>(-シシニアス・マル・ヴェリュータス-)ボズヤにてメネニウス様が回収したアラグの聖遺物にございます。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_899<tab>Certain <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Field Record<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> entries have been updated under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_899ザトゥノル高原で入手可能な「戦果記録帳」の、
一部の項目に、内容が追加されました！

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>New gear can now be purchased from the Resistance supplier at Camp Vrdelnis.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_900「ザトゥノル高原」の、
ヴァルデニス前哨地にいる「レジスタンスの整備兵」から、
新たに防具を交換できるようになりました。

source: TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_901<tab>This new gear can be purchased in exchange for Bozjan platinum coins.
target:
TEXT_LUCKSA305_04088_SYSTEM_000_901防具は、「」との交換により、
入手することができます。
